product_name: Sea to Summit Hydraulic Dry Bag with Harness - 90L
long_description: Designed to hold big, bulky items like sleeping bags or dry suits, the tough, waterproof 90L Sea to Summit Hydraulic dry bag lets you easily carry your gear backpack-style when you're off the water.
short_description: Designed to hold big, bulky items like sleeping bags or dry suits, the tough, waterproof 90L Sea to Summit Hydraulic dry bag lets you easily carry your gear backpack-style when you're off the water.
